Docs.summary: Specifies the attributes of an event.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `EventAttributes` values may be combined using the bitwise OR operation to get the appropriate combination.
These enums are defined in the corhdr.h file and are a combination of bits and enumerators.
## Examples The following example uses reflection emit to create a type with two events. It uses None to specify that the events have no attributes.
